attributes.action: Teachers must experience at least 3 years employment in the work place prior to working in a school
attributes.additional_details:
Teachers educating children ultimately shape society by the way they teach, inspire and influence school children.  Yet many leave University and move straight into teaching with little or no experience of the UK work place.

Potential teachers should have at least 3 years  expeirenced in a non-teaching job prior to starting work in schools.
